title: Will Sprinter Merlier Throw a Wrench in Evenepoel’s Tour de France GC Ambitions?
content:
Quick-Step is bucking the trend and will bring Belgian sprint demon Merlier to the Tour de France: 'We want to show the world it's possible.'

Read the full article at Will Sprinter Merlier Throw a Wrench in Evenepoel’s Tour de France GC Ambitions? on Velo.
author: ahood
